Articles.Content: Just wanted to say hi. Gotta develop stuff for you guys.
Hello right back to you. Can't wait to see what you can do. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Hello right back to you. Can't wait to see what you can do. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Right now, I'm planning to develop a nice first-person mod to push immersion to new levels. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Also, I'd really love to add Oculus Rift support to this game. Sadly, I don't own one, nor could I afford one in near future, but I hope to find some people here who own one so they can test my stuff.

Welcome!

First person EVAs and stuff... \*drools\* That's gonna be awesome!
